ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.

casebody.head_matter:
746 A.2d 1116
Wayne Anthony HOOVER, Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Appellant.
